TITLE: Using Piper GitHub Action in a Workflow
DESCRIPTION: Basic example of how to use the SAP/project-piper-action in a GitHub Actions workflow file. The example shows how to execute a 'mavenBuild' step with specific flags for publishing, creating a BOM, and logging Maven transfers.
SOURCE: https://github.com/SAP/project-piper-action/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: yaml
CODE:
```
- uses: SAP/project-piper-action@main
# or if you want to pin specific version use @v1.0.0 instead of @main
  with:
    step-name: mavenBuild
    flags: '--publish --createBOM --logSuccessfulMavenTransfers'
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Up Vault Secrets for Piper
DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to provide Vault credentials to Piper by setting environment variables for Vault AppRole ID and Secret ID using GitHub Secrets.
SOURCE: https://github.com/SAP/project-piper-action/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: yaml
CODE:
```
env:
  PIPER_vaultAppRoleID: ${{ secrets.PIPER_VAULTAPPROLEID }}
  PIPER_vaultAppRoleSecretID: ${{ secrets.PIPER_VAULTAPPROLESECRETID }}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Custom Defaults from External Repositories
DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to reference custom defaults files from other GitHub repositories by specifying organization name, repository name, file path, and version tag.
SOURCE: https://github.com/SAP/project-piper-action/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: yaml
CODE:
```
with:
  custom-defaults-paths: "orgName1/repo1/path/to/custom-defaults.yml@v1.0.0,orgName2/repo2/path/to/custom-defaults.yml@v2.0.0"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Single Custom Defaults File
DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to specify a single custom defaults configuration file path using the 'custom-defaults-paths' parameter.
SOURCE: https://github.com/SAP/project-piper-action/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: yaml
CODE:
```
with:
  custom-defaults-paths: 'path/to/custom-defaults.yml'
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Multiple Custom Defaults Files
DESCRIPTION: Example demonstrating how to specify multiple custom defaults configuration files by providing comma-separated paths in the 'custom-defaults-paths' parameter.
SOURCE: https://github.com/SAP/project-piper-action/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: yaml
CODE:
```
with:
  custom-defaults-paths: "path/to/custom-defaults1.yml,path/to/custom-defaults2.yml"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating a New Architecture Decision Record
DESCRIPTION: Command to interactively create a new Architecture Decision Record. This launches an interactive CLI tool that guides through the ADR creation process.
SOURCE: https://github.com/SAP/project-piper-action/blob/main/docs/adr/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
log4brains adr new
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Log4brains CLI Globally
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Log4brains tool globally using npm. This is the first step in setting up the ADR environment.
SOURCE: https://github.com/SAP/project-piper-action/blob/main/docs/adr/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install -g log4brains
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Previewing Log4brains Knowledge Base Locally
DESCRIPTION: Command to launch a local preview of the Log4brains knowledge base. This enables hot reload functionality where changes to markdown files are reflected immediately in the UI.
SOURCE: https://github.com/SAP/project-piper-action/blob/main/docs/adr/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
log4brains preview
```
